name: Name or title of the document
description: Description / abstract of the creative work to aid in searching

locationCreated.name: New York, New York, United States of America

additionalProperty.description: Enter the the type of methodology described, for example standard operating procedure, guide, manual, standar specification, or best practice.
Describe how widely this method has been adopted with terms like organisational, multi-organisational, international.
Add keywords to describe the disciplinary area(s) this method is relevant to, ideally using terms from https://vocab.nerc.ac.uk/collection/P08/current/

Add keywords for the GOOS Essential Ocean Variables which this method is relevant to, please use the EOV names provided here: https://www.goosocean.org/index.php?option=com_content&view=article&layout=edit&id=283&Itemid=441

additionalProperty.propertyID: Sustainable Development Goals, Targets, and Indicators
additionalProperty.description: Add the SDG codes for goals (14), targets (14.1), and/or indicators (14.1.1) which this method is relevant to, please use the codes provided here: https://sdgs.un.org/
Please descript the maturity level of your method with a keyword or phrase. For example, concept, pilot, mature.
Include any bibliographic citation for this record here
additionalProperty.value: Smith et al. (2020) How to measure ice. 5(3):Ice Press. NY, USA.

about.name: Name of the action
about.location: Text - which locations are valid for actions supported by this protocol?
object: object on which the action is taken
another object on which the action is taken
about.result: The result of the action - e.g. a DNA sample was generated
